scripts.build:pm: cross-env DOMAIN=pm-toolkit node esbuild.config.js && copyfiles -u 3 'src/domains/pm-toolkit/src/appsscript.json' src/domains/pm-toolkit/build/
scripts.build:forms: cross-env DOMAIN=forms node esbuild.config.js && copyfiles -u 3 'src/domains/forms/src/appsscript.json' src/domains/forms/build/
scripts.push:pm: npm run build:pm && (cd src/domains/pm-toolkit && npm run push:raw)
scripts.push:forms: npm run build:forms && (cd src/domains/forms && npm run push:raw)
